http_debug.description: Enable HTTP debugging: responses and requests will be shown in cleartext

password.description: HeadHunter password that corredponds to the login

chrome_version.description: Major version of impersonated Chrome browser

ignored_resumes.description: Resumes that are specified here will not be boosted (blocklist)

substrings.description: Substrings that will be matched against the titles of ignored resumes

allowed_resumes.description: Only those resumes that are specified here will be boosted (allowlist)

substrings.description: Substrings that will be matched against the titles of allowed resumes

discover_interval.description: A Go duration that specifies how often the resume list should be updated. Set to 0 to disable auto-discovery

discover_backoff_delay.description: A Go duration that specifies how much we should wait if a discovery fails for any reason

boost_interval.description: A Go duration that specifies the desired interval between consecutive resume boosts

boost_backoff_delay.description: A Go duration: specifies how much we should wait if a boost is scheduled but HH unexpectedly throws an error

cookie_jar_file_name.description: File name for storing persistent cookies. If empty, cookie persistence is disabled.
